attributes.action: Introduce a punitive tax on all empty flats and second homes to partially fund building of new affordable housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Look above the shops in any High Street and you will see many empty flats.
Look in many attractive villages and many homes are empty (most of the time) second homes.
At the same time there is a shortage of housing and development on beautiful Greenfield sites, with much more to come.
We ask that a tax is introduced to make leaving properties empty less attractive.  
The proceeds of this tax could directly fund building of affordable or social housing in areas of high need.
